subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers passed its biggest test thus far this year, defeating Pittsburgh on Saturday. For the 19th-ranked Scarlet Knights, it was the type of victory that will likely quiet their few remaining critics.
snippet: Rutgers passed its biggest test thus far this year, defeating Pittsburgh on Saturday. For the 19th-ranked Scarlet Knights, it was the type of victory that will likely quiet their few remaining critics.
